animation

Class Animator2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • animation.Animator2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener

    public class Animator2D
extends java.awt.Frame
implements javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This class is responsible for viewing the animation with jogl
    Author:
    Jim Stanev
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
